h7501.definition: from {{h7495}} and {{h410}}; God has cured; Rephael, an Israelite; Rephael.

h7502.definition: a primitive root; to spread (a bed); by implication, to refresh; comfort, make (a bed), spread.

h7503.definition: a primitive root; to slacken (in many applications, literal or figurative); abate, cease, consume, draw (toward evening), fail, (be) faint, be (wax) feeble, forsake, idle, leave, let alone (go, down), (be) slack, stay, be still, be slothful, (be) weak(-en). See {{h7495}}.

h7504.definition: from {{h7503}}; slack (in body or mind); weak. raphah, Raphah. See {{h7497}}, {{h7498}}. riphah. See {{h7383}}.

h7505.definition: passive participle of {{h7495}}; cured; Raphu, an Israelite; Raphu.

h7506.definition: from an unused root apparently meaning to sustain; support; Rephach, an Israelite; Rephah.

h7507.definition: from {{h7502}}; a railing (as spread along); bottom.

h7508.definition: plural of the masculine of the same as {{h7507}}; ballusters; Rephidim, a place in the Desert; Rephidim.

h7509.definition: from {{h7495}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has cured; Rephajah, the name of five Israelites; Rephaiah.

h7511.definition: a primitive root; to trample, i.e. prostrate; humble self, submit self.

h7513.definition: from {{h7511}}; a raft (as flat on the water); flote.

h7514.definition: a primitive root; to recline; lean.

h7515.definition: a primitive root; to trample, i.e. roil water; foul, trouble.

h7517.definition: probably from {{h7503}}; a stall for cattle (from their resting there); stall.

h7519.definition: a primitive root; to run; also to delight in; accept, run.

h7520.definition: a primitive root; probably to look askant, i.e. (figuratively) be jealous; leap.

h7521.definition: a primitive root; to be pleased with; specifically, to satisfy a debt; (be) accept(-able), accomplish, set affection, approve, consent with, delight (self), enjoy, (be, have a) favour(-able), like, observe, pardon, (be, have, take) please(-ure), reconcile self.

h7522.definition: or רָצֹן; from {{h7521}}; delight (especially as shown); (be) acceptable(-ance, -ed), delight, desire, favour, (good) pleasure, (own, self, voluntary) will, as...(what) would.

h7523.definition: a primitive root; properly, to dash in pieces, i.e. kill (a human being), especially to murder; put to death, kill, (man-) slay(-er), murder(-er).

h7524.definition: from {{h7523}}; a crushing; specifically, a murder-cry; slaughter, sword.

h7525.definition: from {{h7521}}; delight; Ritsjah, an Israelite; Rezia.

h7526.definition: probably for {{h7522}}; Retsin, the name of a Syrian and of an Israelite; Rezin.

h7527.definition: a primitive root; to pierce; bore.

h7528.definition: a denominative from {{h7529}}; to tessellate, i.e. embroider (as if with bright stones); pave.

h7529.definition: for {{h7565}}; a red-hot stone (for baking); coal.

h7530.definition: the same as {{h7529}}; Retseph, a place in Assyria; Rezeph.

h7531.definition: feminine of {{h7529}}; a hot stone; also a tessellated pavement; live coal, pavement.

h7532.definition: the same as {{h7531}}; Ritspah, an Israelitess; Rizpah.

h7533.definition: a primitive root; to crack in pieces, literally or figuratively; break, bruise, crush, discourage, oppress, struggle together.

h7534.definition: from {{h7556}} in its original sense; emaciated (as if flattened out); lean(-fleshed), thin.

h7535.definition: the same as {{h7534}} as a noun; properly, leanness, i.e. (figuratively) limitation; only adverbial, merely, or conjunctional, although; but, even, except, howbeit howsoever, at the least, nevertheless, nothing but, notwithstanding, only, save, so (that), surely, yet (so), in any wise.

h7537.definition: a primitive root; to decay (as by worm-eating); rot.

h7540.definition: a primitive root; properly, to stamp, i.e. to spring about (wildly or for joy); dance, jump, leap, skip.

h7541.definition: feminine of {{h7534}}; properly, thinness, i.e. the side of the head; temple.

h7542.definition: from {{h7534}}; thinness; Rakkon, a place in Palestine; Rakkon.

h7543.definition: a primitive root; to perfume; apothecary, compound, make (ointment), prepare, spice.

h7544.definition: from {{h7543}}; properly, perfumery, i.e. (by implication) spicery (for flavor); spiced.

h7548.definition: feminine of {{h7547}}; a female perfumer; confectioner.

h7549.definition: from {{h7554}}; properly, an expanse, i.e. the firmament or (apparently) visible arch of the sky; firmament.

h7550.definition: from, {{h7556}} in its original sense; a thin cake; cake, wafer.

h7551.definition: a primitive root; to variegate color, i.e. embroider; by implication, to fabricate; embroiderer, needlework, curiously work.

h7552.definition: from {{h7551}}; versicolor; Rekem, the name of a place in Palestine, also of a Midianite and an Israelite; Rekem.

h7553.definition: from {{h7551}}; variegation of color; specifically, embroidery; broidered (work), divers colours, (raiment of) needlework (on both sides).

h7554.definition: a primitive root; to pound the earth (as a sign of passion); by analogy to expand (by hammering); by implication, to overlay (with thin sheets of metal); beat, make broad, spread abroad (forth, over, out, into plates), stamp, stretch.

h7555.definition: from {{h7554}}; beaten out, i.e. a (metallic) plate; broad.

h7556.definition: a primitive root; to spit; spit.

h7557.definition: from {{h7556}} in its original sense of diffusing; a beach (as expanded shingle); Rakkath, a place in Palestine; Rakkath.

h7558.definition: from an unused root meaning to have leave; a permit; grant.

h7559.definition: a primitive root; to record; note.

h7561.definition: a primitive root; to be (causatively, do or declare) wrong; by implication, to disturb, violate; condemn, make trouble, vex, be (commit, deal, depart, do) wicked(-ly, -ness).

h7562.definition: from {{h7561}}; a wrong (especially moral); iniquity, wicked(-ness).

h7563.definition: from {{h7561}}; morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person; condemned, guilty, ungodly, wicked (man), that did wrong.

h7564.definition: feminine of {{h7562}}; wrong (especially moral); fault, wickedly(-ness).

h7565.definition: from {{h8313}}; a live coal; by analogy lightning; figuratively, an arrow, (as flashing through the air); specifically, fever; arrow, (burning) coal, burning heat,   spark, hot thunderbolt.

h7566.definition: the same as {{h7565}}; Resheph, an Israelite; Resheph.

h7567.definition: a primitive root; to demolish; impoverish.

h7568.definition: from {{h3423}}; a net (as catching animals); net(-work).

h7570.definition: a primitive root; to boil; boil.

h7573.definition: a primitive root; to yoke up (to the pole of a vehicle); bind.

h7574.definition: or רֹתֶם; from {{h7573}}; the Spanish broom (from its pole-like stems); juniper (tree).

h7575.definition: feminine of {{h7574}}; Rithmah, a place in the Desert; Rithmah.

h7576.definition: a primitive root; to fasten; bind.

h7577.definition: feminine passive participle of {{h7576}}; something fastened, i.e. a chain; chain.

h7579.definition: a primitive root; to bale up water; (woman to) draw(-er, water).

h7580.definition: a primitive root; to rumble or moan; × mightily, roar.

h7581.definition: from {{h7580}}; a rumbling or moan; roaring.

h7582.definition: a primitive root; to rush; by implication, to desolate; be desolate, (make a) rush(-ing), (lay) waste.

h7583.definition: a primitive root (identical with through the idea of whirling to giddiness); to stun, i.e. (intransitively) be astonished; wonder.

h7585.definition: or שְׁאֹל; from {{h7592}}; hades or the world of the dead (as if a subterranean retreat), including its accessories and inmates; grave, hell, pit.

h7586.definition: passive participle of {{h7592}}; asked; Shaul, the name of an Edomite and two Israelites; Saul, Shaul.

h7587.definition: patronymic from {{h7856}}; a Shaülite or descendant of Shaul; Shaulites.

h7588.definition: from {{h7582}}; uproar (as of rushing); by implication, destruction; × horrible, noise, pomp, rushing, tumult (× -uous).

h7589.definition: from an unused root meaning to push aside; contempt; despite(-ful).

h7590.definition: for active part of {{h7750}} (compare {{h7589}}); one contemning; that (which) despise(-d).

h7592.definition: or שָׁאֵל; a primitive root; to inquire; by implication, to request; by extension, to demand; ask (counsel, on), beg, borrow, lay to charge, consult, demand, desire, × earnestly, enquire,   greet, obtain leave, lend, pray, request, require,   salute, × straitly, × surely, wish.

h7594.definition: from {{h7592}}; request; Sheal, an Israelite; Sheal.

h7595.definition: (Aramaic) from {{h7593}}; properly, a question (at law), i.e. judicial decision or mandate; demand.

h7596.definition: or שֵׁלָה; (1 Samuel 1:17), from {{h7592}}; a petition; by implication, a loan; loan, petition, request.

h7597.definition: or שַׁלְתִּיאֵל; from {{h7592}} and {{h410}}; I have asked God; Shealtiel, an Israelite; Shalthiel, Shealtiel.

h7599.definition: a primitive root; to loll, i.e. be peaceful; be at ease, be quiet, rest. See also {{h1052}}.

h7600.definition: from {{h7599}}; secure; in a bad sense, haughty; that is at ease, quiet, tumult. Compare {{h7946}}.
